description: A suit of dark green full body armor used by army personnel shortly before the cataclysm. It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.
A suit of full body armor in winter camouflage used by army medical personnel during the Battle of Anchorage. It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A suit of full body armor in winter camouflage used by army medical personnel during the Battle of Anchorage. It has a large red cross on the back to signify that you're not an active combatant. Sadly, zombies don't recognize the Geneva Convention. It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage. It is labeled as the advanced combat helmet. This one is in in winter camouflage and was used by army personnel during the Battle of Anchorage.

A warm covering that protects the head and face from the cold in winter camouflage. This one is made of kevlar and nomex for firefighters and the military. It further protects against cuts and flames.
